/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Among these structures, construction cranes can be spotted, indicating the ongoing development and progress in the city. The street itself is a hive of activity with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, further enhancing the lively atmosphere.
